original_text: But when the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead heard what the Philistines had done to Saul,
korean_text: 길르앗 야베스 주민들이 블레셋 사람들이 사울에게 행한 일을 듣고

sentences.original_text: But when the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead heard
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 야베스 길르앗 거민들이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: what the Philistines had done to Saul,
